programme.desc: Three middle-aged couples come to grips with universal questions about marriage and fidelity, professional success and failure and the challenge of finding a second act.

programme.title: Redeeming Love
programme.desc: After meeting Michael and experiencing love for the first time, Angel, facing demons that seem unbeatable, learns that she has the power to choose the life she wants.

programme.title: Metal Tornado
programme.desc: A research team's experiments with solar energy accidentally create massive magnetic vortexes that destroy everything in their path.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Dolphin Bay
programme.desc: A group of friends are spending the summer working as interns at a research center, which is researching unnatural changes in the local reef. After strange events begin to occur, the friends suspect a local legend may be tied to the reef's problems.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Marty McFly must travel through time and make sure his parents meet and fall in love or he'll never be born.

programme.title: A.rtificial I.mmortality
programme.desc: Exploring the latest thinking and technological advancements in AI.

programme.title: Robot Dreams
programme.desc: In 1980s New York City, Dog assembles Robot as a companion, and they become best buddies. On a Labor Day outing to Coney Island, Robot's metal parts rust, and he can't move.

programme.title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck hound finds himself in a town full of cats who need a hero to defend them from a ruthless villain's evil plot. With help from a reluctant trainer, the underdog must assume the role of fearsome samurai and save the day.

programme.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon
programme.desc: Inside his book, Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the book's pages and into the real world, he learns his trusty crayon can set off more hilarious hijinks than he thought possible.

programme.title: The Pod Generation
programme.desc: In the not-so-distant future, amid a society madly in love with technology, tech giant Pegazus offers couples the opportunity to share their pregnancies via detachable artificial wombs or pods. Rachel and Alvy's wild ride to parenthood begins.

programme.title: Strong Fathers, Strong Daughters
programme.desc: When a wealthy businessman learns of his daughter's engagement, he struggles to give up control and trust God with her future.

programme.title: A Real Pain
programme.desc: Mismatched cousins David and Benji tour Poland to honor their grandmother. Their adventure becomes complicated as old tensions resurface while exploring their family history.

programme.title: Marry Me
programme.desc: After finding out about her fiance's cheating ways, a pop superstar impulsively marries a total stranger. As forces conspire to separate the unlikely newlyweds, they must soon decide if two people from such different worlds can find true love.

programme.title: Two Sinners and a Mule
programme.desc: Two ladies of pleasure, kicked out of town, find a an injured bounty hunter. After they nurse him back to health, the ladies decide he needs their help to track down, Gila Grimes, a ruthless, murdering bandit.

programme.title: Final Destination Bloodlines
programme.desc: Plagued by a violent and recurring nightmare, a college student heads home to track down the one person who might be able to break the cycle of death and save her family from the grisly demise that inevitably awaits them all.

programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Despite an amazing first date, Bea and Ben's initial attraction quickly turns sour. However, when they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, they pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: My Son Went Quiet
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a South Asian father and his son begin seeing a shadow around the walls of their home.

programme.title: And Just Like That...
programme.desc: Old pals Carrie, Miranda, and Charlotte transition from the friendship they had in their 30s to a more complicated reality of life and friendship in their 50s.

programme.title: Twisted Neighbor
programme.desc: A cookbook editor moves into a gossipy neighborhood whose residents are obsessed with an app. When one of the neighbors suddenly disappears, the group chat pinpoints her as the prime suspect.

programme.title: Butterfly Tale
programme.desc: Two monarch butterflies become friends during their yearly migration south. Their journey, however, is not as simple as it seems as Patrick has only one wing and Jennifer is afraid of heights.

programme.desc: Kelly-Anne is obsessed with the high-profile case of a serial killer, and reality blurs with her morbid fantasies. She goes down a dark path to get the missing video of the murder of a young girl, to whom Kelly-Anne bears a disturbing resemblance.

programme.title: Battle Court Jai-Alai Championship VII

programme.title: 11th Annual Outhouse Races

programme.title: Swiss Stone Tossing

programme.title: 2025 National Bubble Gum Blowing Championship

programme.desc: With FlingSticks and golf balls, top World League FlingGolf Pros battle to outdistance each other and take home the LFC Belt.

programme.title: Cornhole

programme.title: Saturdays In the South: A History of SEC Football
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the Civil War, America's South is looking to put the past behind it, and finds one path in a growing cultural passion of the North - football. In December 1932, the Southeastern Conference is officially formed.

programme.title: Saturdays In the South: A History of SEC Football
programme.desc: Multiple SEC schools claim national titles from the 1930s through the '50s, including LSU with star running back Billy Cannon in 1958, prior to Cannon's epic game-winning punt return against powerhouse Ole Miss a year later.

programme.title: Saturdays In the South: A History of SEC Football
programme.desc: In the 1960s, as Georgia Tech leaves the conference and the Civil Rights Movement becomes embedded in the history and image of the region, Bear Bryant, hired in 1958, becomes the face of Alabama - and SEC football.

programme.title: Saturdays In the South: A History of SEC Football
programme.desc: As a new decade dawns, quarterbacks Archie Manning, Bert Jones and Condredge Holloway build memorable legacies. Bear Bryant begins a new run of dominance at Alabama, and the rise of television sports transforms the SEC.

programme.title: Saturdays In the South: A History of SEC Football
programme.desc: The 1980s begin with Herschel Walker leading Georgia to a national title as a freshman. After Bear Bryant retires in 1982 and passes away four weeks later, control of the SEC is eventually transferred to Pat Dye and Bo Jackson at Auburn.

programme.title: Saturdays In the South: A History of SEC Football
programme.desc: The 1990s bring change, with expansion and the sport's first-ever conference championship game. Florida's Steve Spurrier fashions an era of high-octane offense, and his Gators form a rivalry with Tennessee and QB Peyton Manning.

programme.title: Saturdays In the South: A History of SEC Football
programme.desc: Nick Saban comes to LSU in 2000 and eventually wins the Tigers' first national championship since 1958 - a feat matched by Les Miles. At Florida, Tim Tebow becomes a cult hero and wins two national titles with Urban Meyer's Gators.

programme.title: Saturdays In the South: A History of SEC Football
programme.desc: The SEC has a run of seven straight national titles, and nine in 12 years. Expansion in 2012 gives the conference 14 schools. Meanwhile, Nick Saban arguably becomes the greatest coach in the history of college football.
